Submodules¶

articull.main module¶

main.py

This module serves as the commandline entry point for running various modes of the application, including feature extraction, classifier training, preprocessing, label generation, and classification. It sets up the computational environment, parses command-line arguments, and dispatches tasks to the appropriate modules.

Functions:
main():

The main function that sets up the argument parser, initializes the computational environment, and runs the specified module.
